categories: Category:Articles which may contain original research

nodes.text: The Gungan assault cannon was a powerful assault weapon produced by the Gungans of Naboo.

The assault cannon was a fusion of organically-grown technology coupled with standard electronic components. It was capable of firing a booma energy ball at long range. This weapon was used by militiagungs of the Gungan Grand Army.[source?]
In 1 ABY Imperial scientists at a secret Imperial Research Facility on the planet Lok had received a grant to reverse engineer a Gungan assault cannon.
